summary.description:
Today, drier conditions in outside humidity (down 9%) and rainfall (down 0.6 mm).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 750 m), feels like temperature (up 1.9°C), outside temperature (up 1.6°C), and inside temperature (up 1.7°C) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 749.0m higher than yesterday, 153.7m lower than the past week, 749.9m lower than the past month.

Yesterday, the cloud levels ranged from a minimum of 765m to a maximum of 2220m, averaging 2010m; the past week and month had slightly higher averages of 2170m and 2760m respectively.
cloud levels.summary: Clouds will be high, allowing good sunlight.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; warm but comfortable temperatures are expected. Also, a humid atmosphere. Chance of light rain, clouds will be high, allowing good sunlight, and sunlight levels will peak at very high intensity. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
